definitions: able to be used or played

examples.text: the game will be playable over the internet
the organ was just about playable
the CD is playable on your TV

definitions: (of a field, court, etc.) fit for playing on

examples.text: the newly completed second green will be playable soon
we also made sure the course is playable in all types of weather

shortDefinitions: (of pitch, court, etc.) fit for playing on

definitions: (of a ball in a game) able to be hit or kicked

examples.text: he had no idea the ball was playable

shortDefinitions: (of ball in game) able to be hit or kicked
